name: Minerals Technologies Inc.
description: Minerals Technologies Inc. is a global leader in specialty minerals and related services, providing innovative solutions and products to a diverse range of industries. Founded in 1992, the company operates in more than 30 countries and is recognized for its commitment to innovation and sustainability. Minerals Technologies specializes in the production of mineral-based products, including precipitated calcium carbonate, talc, and bentonite, which are used in various applications such as paper, plastics, paints, coatings, and personal care products. The company also offers advanced materials and technologies, including performance materials and environmental products that contribute to cleaner production processes and resource efficiency. With a strong focus on research and development, Minerals Technologies continuously seeks to enhance its product offerings and expand its market reach. The company's mission is to deliver superior value to its customers through high-quality products, exceptional service, and sustainable practices, ultimately contributing to economic growth and environmental stewardship.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
